an11.15:4.1: “Mendicants, you can expect eleven benefits when the heart’s release by love has been cultivated, developed, and practiced, made a vehicle and a basis, kept up, consolidated, and properly implemented.
an11.15:5.2: You sleep well. You wake happily. You don’t see bad dreams. Humans love you. Non-humans love you. Gods protect you. You can’t be harmed by fire, poison, or blade. Your mind quickly calms down. Your face is clear and bright. You don’t feel lost when you die. If you don’t reach any higher, you’ll be reborn in a Brahmā realm.
an11.15:5.3: You can expect eleven benefits when the heart’s release by love has been cultivated, developed, and practiced, made a vehicle and a basis, kept up, consolidated, and properly implemented.”
